This website provides a collection of resources for the book O'Sullivan D. 2024. [_Computing Geographically: Bridging Giscience and Geography_](https://www.guilford.com/books/Computing-Geographically/David-O'Sullivan/9781462553938) (Guilford Press, New York).

Included are:

*Updated links* for internet sources referenced in the text

*Code samples* to create alternative (often colour) versions of some of the figures

*Background information* on other figures

[*High resolution copies of all the figures*](the-figures/) from the book as published

[*Other odds and ends*](posts.qmd)
